response.original_title: A True Ensemble: The Cast of L.A. Confidential
response.overview: Russell Crowe, Kevin Spacey, Guy Pearce, Kim Basinger, Danny DeVito, David Strathairn and James Cromwell join director Curtis Hanson and others in this free-wheeling look at the incomparable ensemble cast of L.A. Confidential.
response.title: A True Ensemble: The Cast of L.A. Confidential
